text: Paul Andrews (born 17 May 1958 - 21 October 2024), better known by his stage name Paul Di'Anno, was a British singer. He was best known as the first lead singer of heavy metal band Iron Maiden from 1977 to 1981. Di'Anno was born in Chingford, London. In 2011, he was jailed for fraud. Di'Anno died on 21 October 2024 in Salisbury, Wiltshire at the age of 66. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1958 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Criminals from London Category:English rock singers Category:Fraudsters Category:Heavy metal singers Category:People from Chingford Category:Singers from London
title: Paul Di'Anno
